course_description: The nature of a teaching assistantship varies from department to department. The defining characteristic of this position across all departments and programs is a controlled, carefully monitored initial teaching opportunity. A teaching assistant may be responsible for 10 to 12 hours per week of discussion or laboratory supervision.
prerequisites: TATT 600 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1030, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Stein, Status: Open
